name: react-trpc-fastify-boilerplate
description: Full-stack boilerplate with React, tRPC, Fastify, Prisma, and PostgreSQL

scripts.install:all: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd server && npm run build && cd client && npm run build

author: nuhman
